modName: Distant Decal Lod Animation ini Fix
summary:
This fix the Moss and cracks pop in on walls and some other decal problems in the game
And the npc animation is much better from distance
npc spawns from a greater distance
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=200][color=red]Distant Decal Lod Animation ini Fix[/color][/size][/center]



[center][color=yellow]Npc Animation
Moss Cracks Decals
Items Npc Distance[/color][/center]

This fix the Moss and cracks pop in on walls and some other decal problems in the gameÂ 
And the npc animation is much better from distance
npc spawns from a greater distance

The Distant Decal lod Animations ini Fix.
This one will have all the Fixes
you have to manually add and edit in the skyrim.ini and skyrimprefs.ini
and there is a small guide in the text file aswell

The Distant Decal Animations esp ini Fix.
will have Moss cracks Decals, and Npc animation, and u dont have to add or edit the ini files.
unpack and install in your skyrim data folder
there is a readme inside how to install


This will work with any mod u have installed so it have full compatibility

enjoy !!
author: BenTusi
